longBusinessSummary: Isetan Mitsukoshi Holdings Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, engages in the department store business in Japan and internationally. The company operates through four segments: Department Store Business, Credit & Finance/Customer Organization Management Business, Real Estate Business, and Other Business. It is involved in the credit card, insurance, and other businesses; constructs and manages underground garages, public underground passages, and underground shopping malls; leases shops; operates restaurants; operates shares and business management, and online mall and others; commercial and corporate management consulting; and designs, constructs, operates, and leases real estate properties, as well as offers tenant leasing and building maintenance and environment production services. The company also offers employment agency, recruitment office, personnel, education and training, and labor and welfare services, as well as information systems solutions. In addition, it engages in the supermarket, retail, and specialty shops; food production; and wholesaling business, as well as operates airport style duty free shops. Further, the company plans, develops, imports, and sells gifts, novelty, and lifestyle goods; imports and wholesales western wine and spirits, foods, and miscellaneous products; and sells foodstuffs, clothing, and other daily goods. Additionally, it plans, produces, promotes, and sells commercials, video signs, TV programs, movies, plays, entertainment and fashion shows, parties, etc.; engages in advertising agency business; plans and sells travel products and conducts tours; owns and operates river cruise ships; and operates beauty and hair salons and sports clubs, and sells cosmetics. The company was incorporated in 2008 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.
